name: spotify-track-artist
description: Creates a database of Spotify tracks and artists.  Creates a set of REST services for adding tracks and querying the database populated from the Spotify API.

scripts.migrate: pushd db; npx env-cmd -f ../.env npx sequelize-cli db:migrate; popd
scripts.migrate:undo: pushd db; npx env-cmd -f ../.env npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo; popd
scripts.seed: pushd db; npx env-cmd -f ../.env npx sequelize-cli db:seed; popd
scripts.seed:undo: pushd db; npx env-cmd -f ../.env npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo; popd

author: Greg Sandell
